T02D2424:38b-1: b'a hya aanta ra aa mri ta kalpa n'a ma /
T02D2424:38b-3: phyi nang bdud rtsi'i bcud len zhes bya ba /
T02D2424:38b-4: rdo rje rnal 'byor ma la phyag 'tshal lo ;
T02D2424:38b-5: / rgyun chad bdud rtsis gsang ba bcud len gyis //
T02D2424:38b-6: nyams len thabs dang de yi sman sbyor dang //
T02D2424:38b-7: nyams su blangs na tshe ring grub pa thob //
T02D2424:38b-8: de phyir bdag nyid bya ra'i nyams len bshad //
T02D2424:38b-9: rnal 'byor phyi yi nyams len byed na ni //
T02D2424:38b-10: bdud rtsi lnga yis rang lus dag par byas //
T02D2424:39a-1: snang mi bskyod rin chen 'byung ldan la //
T02D2424:39a-2: 'od dpag med dang don yod grub pa rnams //
T02D2424:39a-3: rang gi lus gnas nyams len shes pa med //
T02D2424:39a-4: m'a ma k'i yi rgyud btus nyams len bshad //
T02D2424:39a-5: rnam snang blangs la rdo rje'i chu yis dkrugs //
T02D2424:39a-6: btsir nas snod kyi nang du thun phyed bhag /
T02D2424:39a-7: byin brlab mchod bya rlung med sa ru brdung //
T02D2424:39a-8: rlung nad can la bu ram sbyar bar bya //
T02D2424:39a-9: bad kan can la tsha ba gsum dang sbyar //
T02D2424:39a-10: dri med rnam snang btsir nas grib skam bya //
T02D2424:39a-11: zhib par btags nas mar dang sbrang rtsi sbyar //
T02D2424:39a-12: mi bskyod pa yis sprus nas bza' btung bya //
T02D2424:39a-13: sha dang 'o ma za zhing chang rnams spang //
T02D2424:39a-14: rnam snang nyams len bdag nyid bhya ris smras //
T02D2424:39a-15: mi bskyod bskol nas mar dang kha ra sbyar //
T02D2424:39a-16: grangs par byas nas rnal 'byor btung bar bya //
T02D2424:39a-17: chang dang bud med spangs na zla drug grub //
T02D2424:39a-18: mi bskyod bcud len bhya ris smra bar byed //
T02D2424:39a-19: rin chen 'byung ldan ga na dhi dngul chu dang //
T02D2424:39a-20: ra yi 'o ma sbrang dang bhi ta ste //
T02D2424:39a-21: zhib par btags nas ka ra la sogs sbyar //
T02D2424:39a-22: mar khu bton nas rnal 'byor lus la byugs //
T02D2424:39a-23: sman rnams gtong dus khengs pa'i dus su gtong //
T02D2424:39a-24: gzhan dang mi 'dra bha ri stobs skyes so //
T02D2424:39a-25: dbyar zla gsum la don yod grub pa yi //
T02D2424:39a-26: aa ru ra dang sman tsha sbyar la bza' //
T02D2424:39a-27: ston gsum ka ra aa ru ra sbyar nas //
T02D2424:39a-28: rnal 'byor pa ni lto stong dag la bza' //
T02D2424:39a-29: dgun gsum 'bras bu gsum dang sbyar la bza' //
T02D2424:39a-30: dpyid gsum mar sbrang 'bras bu gsum sbyar bza' //
T02D2424:39a-31: don yod grub pa'i rnal 'byor bcud len pas //
T02D2424:39a-32: nad rnams sel zhing don rnams grub bar byed //
T02D2424:39a-33: shing mngar sbrang mar 'od dpag med pa 'bras bu gsum //
T02D2424:39a-34: cong zhi dang sbyar zos na nad rnams sel //
T02D2424:39a-35: cis kyang rnal 'byor bla ma'i zhal la ltos //
T02D2424:39a-36: 'od dpag med kyi bcud len bhya ris smras //
T02D2424:39a-37: zla ba drug nas rnal 'byor ru rta bskol la btang //
T02D2424:39a-38: dkar gsum mngar gsum rten dbang chu bskol btang //
T02D2424:39a-39: mdor na ci dgos kha zas rim gyis spang //
T02D2424:39a-40: brag la sbyar nas bhya ris brten par bya //
T02D2424:39a-41: kha zas rgyun chad bshad nas gsang ba bshad par bya //
T02D2424:39a-42: snying ga'i dbus nas yi dam lha nyid ni //
T02D2424:39a-43: rdo rje phag mo zhal gcig phyag gnyis ldan //
T02D2424:39b-0: sems dpa'i skyil @39b krung bdud rtsi bum pa 'dzin //
T02D2424:39b-1: ngag tu h'um brjod snying ga gyen la bzlog / yum gyi 'od kyis dkar nag mtshams su bcad //
T02D2424:39b-2: aom a'a:h'um brjod zhal nas bdud rtsi 'dzag / dkar nag bcad pa'i mtshams nas 'bab pa yin //
T02D2424:39b-3: rang lus khong stod 'o lngar gang bar bsam //
T02D2424:39b-4: de ni ting 'dzin sems dpa' bdag gis smras //
T02D2424:39b-5: mdun gyi mkha' la ye shes sems dpa' ste //
T02D2424:39b-6: yid kyis dran nas de yi 'od kyis ni //
T02D2424:39b-7: rang gi smin mtshams yan chad thod pa bcad //
T02D2424:39b-8: ye shes sems dpas aom a'a:h'um brjod pas //
T02D2424:39b-9: thod pa'i bdud rtsa 'dzag ste rtsa sbubs shugs //
T02D2424:39b-10: bum pa'i 'og tu ram 'bar bdud rtsi blugs //
T02D2424:39b-11: de nas 'dres pas lus ni bdud rtsis gang //
T02D2424:39b-12: gnyis med de yi stobs kyis chu ser sogs //
T02D2424:39b-13: gsang ba'i gnas nas mar la 'dzag par bsam //
T02D2424:39b-14: de nas mar shal yar la bdud rtsis rang lus gang //
T02D2424:39b-15: slar yang rnal 'byor thod pa'i bcad 'phro las //
T02D2424:39b-16: bdud rtsi sor gcig lud nas gang bar bsam //
T02D2424:39b-17: gal te rnal 'byor rlung khams skyes na ni //
T02D2424:39b-18: snying ga'i bum ba mar gyis gang bar bsam //
T02D2424:39b-19: mkhris pas skya rims tshad nad 'bab nad la //
T02D2424:39b-20: ga bur chu bzhin nang lus bsil bar bsam //
T02D2424:39b-21: rnal 'byor grang ba'i nad ni na gyur na //
T02D2424:39b-22: drod sman rnams kyi stobs ni bsgom par bya //
T02D2424:39b-23: bsgoms kyang skyo na hrim yig blo ldan bzla //
T02D2424:39b-24: bhya ri bdag gis gsang ba'i bcud len smras //
T02D2424:39b-25: brtan pa'i sems kyis rnal 'byor nyid kyis bsgrubs //
T02D2424:39b-26: nyams su myong ba'i yon tan nad rnams sel //
T02D2424:39b-27: zla drug shes rab blo 'phel rang bzhin skye //
T02D2424:39b-28: slob dpon bhya ris gsungs pa'i phyi nang gi bdud rtsi'i bcud len gyi gdams pa rdzogs so //
T02D2424:39b-29: rgya gar gyi pandi ta ratna pha las rang 'gyur du mdzad nas /
